title: Chicken Tacos
description: Classic Mexican tacos with grilled chicken, cilantro, lime, and onions.
instructions: Wash and pat dry the chicken breast.
Season both sides with salt, pepper, cumin, and paprika.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and add oil.
Cook the chicken for 5-7 minutes per side until fully cooked.
Remove chicken and let it rest for 5 minutes.
Slice or shred the chicken into pieces.
Warm tortillas on a dry skillet for 30-60 seconds per side.
Place chicken on tortillas, top with onion and cilantro.
Squeeze lime juice over the tacos and serve.
